login-help: You have already registered your organisation or you are part of an organisation?
otp-sent: OTP has been sent to your {{loginBy}}
password-reset-link-sent-email: Password reset link sent to your email. Open on the link in the email and then change your password.
password-reset-link-sent-mobile: Password reset link sent to your mobile as SMS. Open on the link and then change your password.
register-organisation-group: Register your organisation or as user
reset-password-title: Reset your password by providing your user id
server-session-expired: Login session expired. Please login again.
invalid-user-name: User name is not a valid email or mobile number
register-as-user-help: After registration share your email/mobile with organisation administrator to get added
user-already-in-organisation: This user is already in your organisation
no-such-user-found: No user with that email or mobile number found
